pullrequest.title: Fix actor animation loading and rendering issues

content.raw: Hi Nathan, Initially I forked at version 3.1 and my modifications solved the actor animation issues. Now after merging with Gazebo default, Collada file is not loaded. There have been considerable changes from 3.1 to current specially for ColladaLoader.cc. As I tracked down so far issue is in somewhere in ColladaLoader::LoadPolylist(). I will try to get that fixed. Any suggestion?
content.html: Hi Nathan, Initially I forked at version 3.1 and my modifications solved the actor animation issues. Now after merging with Gazebo default, Collada file is not loaded. There have been considerable changes from 3.1 to current specially for ColladaLoader.cc. As I tracked down so far issue is in somewhere in ColladaLoader::LoadPolylist(). I will try to get that fixed. Any suggestion?
